scripts.start:frontend: cd packages && cd frontend && npm run build && npm run dev
scripts.start:backend: cd packages && cd api && npm run dev
scripts.start:frontend:build: cd packages && cd frontend && npm run build && npm run dev
scripts.start:backend:build: cd packages && cd api && npm run build && npm run dev
scripts.start:docker: cd packages && cd docker && docker compose -f docker-compose.yml up --force-recreate
scripts.start:docker:start: cd packages && cd docker &&  docker start  facilita-juridico-pg
